name: A Cats Journey
description:
Help this cat get back to the safety of his sewer home.

How to play:

  • Click/Touch and drag items around to provide passage.
  • Collect Mice for dinner if you can.
  • Listen to the smooth jazz tunes autogenreated by WolframAlpha tones.

Credits/Programs

  •  Engine - Godot
  •  Water and Fog Shaders - Gonkee's Tutorial
  •  Music - Wolfram Alpha Tones
